goals__remit: The SESAR Deployment Alliance (SDA) is a group of air navigation service providers, airports and airlines that have been selected through a public calls for proposals by the European Commission (EC) in order to synchronise and coordinate the deployment phase of SESAR - the Single European Air Traffic Management Research Programme - and to act as the SESAR Deployment Manager in order to carry out the management level of the deployment governance, as foreseen in art.9 of Implementing Regulation No. 409/2013
